The video was published on Facebook on J: 2019, by a page with over 15,000 followers.
The video: s caption in Urdu translates to English as: "Congratulations Pakistanis.... in Paris Air Show Pakistan's JF-17 got the first position... see your eyes... share it too... also like our page Congratulations."
